dream:
🌙🏃‍🐺 *runs in circles around an imaginary moon*
*squeezes eyes shut and tilts head up, letting out a soft howl*: 👀😨
*jumps over a "hill" made of leaves*: 🍂👣
goal:
🌑💤 *cowers at edge of woods, tail tucked between legs*
*whimpers softly, ears perked up*: 🐾💔
*takes a step closer to understanding, but hesitates, eyes fixed on the ominous moon*: 👀😨
